saraclarkyoga: I feel you sis! And attitude of gratitude always balances out the intensity if life and in this case Mercury retrograde. Thanks for the reminder. Hair is looking good!
adoseofom: Finding your page somehow through cosmic black magical love is what I’m grateful for. Also, for learning self-love and self-care in my lowest moments. Learning to ride my highs with grace and humility. Digging into my bones. Cheers to the retrograde and 🌙eclipse
ajsela: Grateful for this post on early Sunday rainy morning while drinking my black coffee ☕️ ( very very grateful for that ) helloz and thank you from London 🇬🇧
robinhoodrawz: You’re stunning as always, Ev’Yan! I’ve been following you online since I read your interview on Black Girl with Long Hair; loved your ethic and vibe and I continue to encourage people to seek you out for all of the sexual liberation advice and resources you share. So first, I’m grateful for you and other folks like you working to empower POC. Thank you ❤️. These days I’m also grateful for spaces I can call my own. Spaces to live, work, retreat, and just be.
stefosofsky: For the penetration of the Sun. For deep sleep. For cold water when it’s so damn hot outside. For the wisdom of the desert. For friends that pick you up from the airport. For your work in the world. For my mother. For being touched by hands that listen and respond and respect. For coconut oil. For this inhale.
evajannotta: I am grateful for the new striped tank top that I love and that my partner always compliments whenever I wear it. I’m grateful that it’s Saturday and I had a calm work week. m.a.d.d.o.g: Thank you for sharing this energy. I’m having so much trouble this retrograde. Stagnant energy abounds! A good reminder to stay thankful🌟✨
vidaglows: I’m grateful to be alive, for my health and home and all my loves. Im grateful for you and all the femmes out on the leading edge of the body positivity and sexual liberation movement. Your hair looks amazing
lnrbrtsn: I’m grateful for my health, my body, and the ability to discover this world.
kimstagram_13: Love this! I’m thankful for my open mind and my sense of humor. Thankful for my amazing group of friends. sparklesrmyfavoritething: I am grateful for safe travels and beautiful adventures. I am grateful to my angels ancestors & guides. I am grateful for all the love I am and that I am supported by and am able to give. I am grateful for true friends and true lovers. I am grateful for the Mediterranean Sea and all that she has cleansed from me, all the beauty that she is and all the luscious hues and ebbs n flows n swells n churns n fizzes n powerful delight n depth. I am grateful for cooling waters in summer heat. I am grateful for English roses and all the wild blooms I love so dear. I am grateful for the care I receive and that I give to myself n others. I am grateful for healing & the gentle power of reiki n breath. I am grateful to be a woman, to be just who I am. I am grateful for all the beings who inspire n teach me. I am grateful for my loving family. I am grateful for nature, for seasons, for the sun n moon n stars. I am grateful for life love n grace. Thank you for this invitation and for your work @evyan.whitney
